headline: A Look At Estée Lauder (EL) Valuation After Tariff Headwinds Spark Post Earnings Selloff
summary: Estée Lauder Companies (EL) shares came under pressure after the company paired better than expected second quarter results with a cautious full year profit outlook, highlighting an estimated US$100 million tariff hit. See our latest analysis for Estée Lauder Companies. The sharp selloff after earnings comes on top of a choppy run, with a 7 day share price return of 13.71% and a 30 day share price return of 5.51% offset against a 90 day share price return of 13.36%. Even so, long term total...
